channel.title: IPFS Gateway on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in IPFS Gateway on Security365 Docs

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Troubleshooting ​​ Cloudflare-specific ​​ No link named “ipfs” If you get a no link named "ipfs" under <<CID>> error message when trying to access content through Cloudflare’s IPFS gateway, that means you have created a gateway without a value for the DNSLink. Since Cloudflare currently only supports restricted gateways - and not universal gateways - these requests will continue to fail until you specify a DNSLink value. ​​ Check Cloudflare’s status It is worth checking for recent incidents on Cloudflare’s status dashboard External link icon Open external link that may have affected our gateway, but the best place to get up-to-date information about issues facing IPFS is the IPFS Discussion Forum External link icon Open external link .
